#Bybit #TheCryptoArk #Web3 #Crypto

❓What does Crypto Ark mean?
🎙️ The Crypto Ark is a safe vessel for everyone to come onboard and sail through the uncertain seas of Web3 and crypto with a suite of industry-leading products that helps them to trade easily without worry.

Learn more: https://t.co/FyGssSEy8U

❓How does Bybit deal with security threats?
🎙️ The majority of users' funds are stored in offline wallets with a combination of multi-signature and TSS. We also look for malicious activities on user accounts in real time so that we can react immediately.

❓Are Bybit users' funds safe?
🎙️ Users' funds are stored securely, with 80% in cold wallets, 10% in warm wallets and 10% in hot wallets. We are also developing a UID-level Merkle Tree for Proof of Reserves.

See our main users' asset wallets here: https://t.co/fiFeVOTKwS

💪🏻 So long as you hold a certain amount of crypto, you can become a market maker & liquidity provider.

🎯 We should aim to protect people’s interests while acknowledging the future of finance: #crypto is a risk-on asset people are demanding exposure to.

🙏🏻 For people living with double digit unemployment rates, inflation & fluctuating #fiat currencies, $BTC is a safe haven asset.

🫂 It doesn't have to be a “friend or foe” situation for banks & #crypto: We can use more humility from both sides.

🌐 Crypto players can learn from the incumbents in due diligence, compliance & customer protection. 

🙌🏻 There's room for both collaboration & competition.

🔥 Wrapping up the panel, @IgneusTerrenus stood firm in his belief that the community should always aim to be a catalyst of change. 

🙌🏻 Don’t just pay lip service to inclusion but put your money where your mouth is & support artists whose art we admire and values we align with.

💡 NFTs simply move art ownership onto a blockchain.

🤔 Would you buy a piece of physical art you don't appreciate? If the answer is no, you shouldn't be buying that NFT. Own a piece you appreciate and connect with!

"We are still in the early days of the #NFT boom & it's not the time to rush into judgement of what counts as art. People are starting to recognize & be part of a new way to express themselves, communicate, transact & connect with an audience in a way that breaks down barriers."

🔥 @IgneusTerrenus shared that #NFTs remain hugely important as a programmable culture — a piece of culture we can truly call our own.

🌐 It solves the challenges art has always faced throughout history: a reliable chain of custody and verifiable authenticity.

🗓 Today at @ArtDubai, @IgneusTerrenus, Bybit’s Head of Comms, spoke on a #BybitTalks panel unpacking the big question: Why do #NFTs matter?

💥 The first members of the Bybit Galaxy Crew have just emerged from the shadows.

✅ Learn more about the traits of The Pathfinder:
https://t.co/3sI3sVObD6

🛡 Strength/Power: The ability to form shields, protecting those around them from attacks of any scale.
 
🧭 Weapon/Tool: An old-school compass that points them in the right direction.
🧩 They can be found tinkering in their workshops or hunched over their desks in concentration — assembling and fortifying the universe of the future in their hands, piece by piece.

💥 The Pathfinder

💫 Sharp-witted front runners who navigate the galaxy with finesse, providing the physical foundations and mapping out every pit stop from start to end — so every other person can go further in their journeys.

https://t.co/3sI3sVObD6 https://t.co/FtNYxE1ZAH

✅ Learn more about the traits of The Maven:
https://t.co/3sI3sVObD6

🧠 Strength/Power: Knowledge is power.

📊 Weapon/Tool: The only weapon they need is data. They do, however, occasionally need a laptop as they work their way through spreadsheets and tables.

🔢 They live and breathe numbers, data and trends; in a world saturated with information, the Explorer shares their analytical findings so every person lost at sea gets to take their next steps in confidence.

💥 The Maven

🧐 Insightful analysts who drive success backed by data, leaving no stone unturned. Every detail catches their eye as they dive deep into spaces unknown, offering clarity and unique perspectives into even the most infinitesimal of things.

https://t.co/3sI3sVObD6 https://t.co/fJW6W32rzV
✅ Learn more about the traits of The Ally: https://t.co/3sI3sVObD6

🦾 Strength/Power: Superhuman strength to hold others up high even in the toughest of storms.

💓 Weapon/Tool: Their unconditional, compassionate hearts for others.
🤖 Your ever-present listening ear and the strongest support at your backs, ready to pull you along to higher altitudes if you need a helping hand.

💥 The Ally

💕 Caring community builders who foster meaningful relationships — going beyond names and faces, the humble, respectful Ally connects with every person they meet.

https://t.co/3sI3sVObD6 https://t.co/0uSpV5rl4z

✅ Learn more about the traits of The Forager:
https://t.co/3sI3sVObD6

🌿 Strength/Power: Accelerate the healthy growth of plants and foliage in their midst.

👩‍🌾 Weapon/Tool: They are most commonly seen out in the fields with a garden rake.

🧝 The down-to-earth Forager bridges seemingly insurmountable differences within and across communities, and is always on a wandering journey for new opportunities.
💓They traverse over lands far and wide, existing harmoniously with the creatures, flora and fauna that inhabit it.

💥 The Forager

🧝‍♀️ Adventurous explorers who delve fearlessly into new discoveries, immersing themselves in nature as they find optimal ways to reach out to local communities. 

https://t.co/3sI3sVObD6 https://t.co/cZLGiJIHBw
✅ Learn more about the traits of The Maker: https://t.co/3sI3sVNDNy

⚡️ Strength/Power: Superspeed — you couldn't catch them even if you tried!

🛠 Weapon/Tool: They can always be seen with their multi-purpose handy toolbox.
🦅 Go-getters, bold and ever-ready to step into uncharted spaces, the Maker is always on the hunt for something new and never falls behind.

💥 The Maker

🧠 Visionaries with brilliant minds who imagine and build advanced products; sagacious planners who are constantly at the forefront of breakthroughs in innovation. 

Nothing comes close to perfection, because there is always room for better.

Centralized vs Decentralized Exchange 🧐

It doesn’t have to be a zero sum game. There’s a huge total addressable market where centralized and decentralized exchanges can collaborate as well as compete to create a healthy ecosystem to meet everyone’s needs at all times.

In our experience, regulations do listen to feedback from market participants. For the industry to thrive, we really need a regulatory framework that is build on experts and people who understands how decentralized finance works.

@IgneusTerrenus : Regulations don’t have to be a “challenge” per se — as a crypto exchange Bybit embraces progressive regulations. Because our vision isn’t so different: We want to protect our customers and we want the industry to thrive.
